name: Baruch Spinoza
notable_ideas: ''Conatus'', Multitude, ''Sub specie aeternitatis'', ''Causa sui'', ''Deus sive Natura''
influences: Franciscus van den Enden, Christiaan Huygens, René Descartes
influenced: Leibniz, Gotthold Ephraim Lessing, Novalis, Goethe, Coleridge, Hegel,Schopenhauer, Marx, Hess, G. Eliot, Nietzsche, Santayana, Einstein, Wittgenstein, Borges, Davidson, Deleuze, Renouvier,  Althusser, Balibar, Negri, L. Strauss, Yalom,
